mapper.select: select ii.ID, ii.IF_NAME, ii.IF_DESC, (select a.USERNAME from T_IF_USER a where a.id = ii.IF_CREATEBY) DSNAME, ii.IF_URL, (select sys.IF_SYS_NAME from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) SYS_NAME, (select pro.IF_PRO_NAME from T_IF_PRO pro where pro.id=ii.IF_PRO_ID and pro.IF_SYS_ID=ii.IF_SYS_ID) PRO_NAME, (select sys.ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_INTERFACE ii where ii.ID=#{id} and ii.ISVALID='Y'

select ID, ii.IF_NAME, ii.IF_URL, (select sys.IF_SYS_NAME from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) SYS_NAME, (select pro.IF_PRO_NAME from T_IF_PRO pro where pro.id=ii.IF_PRO_ID and pro.IF_SYS_ID=ii.IF_SYS_ID) PRO_NAME, (select sys.ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_INTERFACE ii where ii.ISVALID='Y' and ii.IF_PROTOCOL='HTTP' and ii.IF_TYPE!='GET' and ii.IF_PRO_ID!=2 order by IF_SYS_ID
select count(*) from T_IF_INTERFACE a where a.IF_PROTOCOL ="HTTP" AND a.ISVALID="Y" and not isNull(a.IF_URL) AND a.`IF_URL`!="test.do" and a.IF_PRO_ID!=2
